text: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيْنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka telah memotong-motong urusan (agama) mereka di antara mereka. Kepada Kamilah masing-masing golongan itu akan kembali.
